channel.title: How do i change the ingame writing?
channel.description: okay so me and my bro are almost ready to get our server online although we hate the ingame writing, it's set to do glow2 and wave and we'd like to just make it the normal yellow writing again, can anyone help? weve been searching for about 3hrs now looking for how to change it so weve decided to ask here =/

item.title: How do i change the ingame writing?
item.dc:creator: @wissdude wissdude
item.description:
@wissdude wrote:

kk thanks, do you mean client help or client hacks?

Read full topic
